onyx.title: Onyx built-in
onyx.description: Install Crystal with it's in-house desktop experience, a custom GNOME session with a familiar layout. Or choose your favourite!

timeshift.title: Automatic Backups
timeshift.description: Backup & Restore your system. Easily boot into Btrfs snapshots.

amethyst.title: Amethyst
amethyst.description: Amethyst is a fast, efficient and lightweight AUR helper and Pacman wrapper. Made for Crystal, compatible with any Arch-based Linux distribution.
